div.div: Species correlation coefficients with selected past year temperatures.
div.p: Histograms of correlation coefficients (r) for all species' intraspecific temperature-mass relationships with mean annual temperature from ( A) the year in which individuals were collected, ( B) 25 years prior to collection year, and ( C) 50 years prior to collection year. Dark vertical lines are correlation coefficients of zero. For all past year temperatures, see Figure 4â€”figure supplement 1.
